      • swap

        public boolean swap(int x1,
           int y1,
           int x2,
           int y2)
        Tries to swap the objects in two cells specified by their coordinates. If swap becomes successful, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.
        Requires:
        • board field is non-null
        • rules field is non-null
        • RuleEngine has instance predicate methods gameEndedByMovements(int) and isSwappable(Board, int, int, int).
        • board field is non-null, contains non-null cells with non-null ChewyObjects
        • Board has an instance method fillCellAt(int, int, ChewyObject)
        • integer field movementsLeft is initialized
        Modifies:
        if returned true;
        • board field
        • level field
        • movementsLeft field
        Ensures:
        If swap returns true, then ChewyObjects of the cells at the board positions (x1, y1), (x2, y2) is exchanged.
        Otherwise, nothing will be changed.

      • dropAll

        public void dropAll()
        Requires:
        board is non-null, cells of the board are non-null, Board has instance methods cellAt(int, int) and fillCellAt(int, int, ChewyObject), Nothing and Lokum inherits ChewyObject. Default type of the Nothing object is String "empty".
        Modifies:
        level, board.
        Ensures:
        There is no cell in the board whose bottom contains a Nothing abject.

      • isThereAvailableMove

        public boolean isThereAvailableMove()

      • isThereNothing

        public boolean isThereNothing()
        Requires:
        board is non-null, board's all cells returned are non-null and contain non-null objects that are that has getType methods returning type as String. Nothing objects type is "empty", ignoring case.
        Ensures:
        returned true if there is any Nothing object(any empty cell) in the board, false o/w.

      • fillAllNothingsRandomly

        public void fillAllNothingsRandomly()
        Requires:
        board is non-null, board's all cells returned are non-null and contain non-null objects that are that has getType methods returning type as String. Nothing objects type is "empty", ignoring case.
        Modifies:
        board, level
        Ensures:
        all cells are filled with ChewyObjects that are not Nothing.
